ingredients.content: 1 oz Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces
2 oz red bell peppers, cut into 1 in. pieces
2 oz yellow onions, cut into 1 in. pieces
1 oz carrots, cut into 1 in. pieces

preparations.content: Place water into mixing bowl and insert simmering basket, weigh in rice and farro and rinse <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Stir with aid of spatula through hole in mixing bowl lid to ensure a thorough rinsing.
Cook <b>32 min/212°F/speed 4<b>. Remove simmering basket with spatula, transfer rice and farro to a bowl and allow to cool. Discard steaming water and dry mixing bowl.
Place flaxseeds, oats and Parmesan into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place red bell peppers, onions, carrot, garlic, basil, tomato paste, salt, and chili flakes into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix a further <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add reserved grains and oat-Parmesan mixture and mix <b>10 sec//speed 4<b>.

Divide and shape mixture into four equal-sized patties. Cover loosely with cling wrap and chill for 20 minutes. Heat frying pan over medium high heat and add oil. Fry patties 4 minutes each side or until golden brown.
Serve burgers immediately with your favorite condiment and sliced avocado between toasted buns.
